text: Santiago Bakero Escudero (born 31 January 1958) is a retired Spanish footballer who played as a forward. He is the brother of former players José Mari Bakero, Jon Bakero and Félix Bakero, as well as being the uncle of current player Jon Bakero. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Palencia CF |1979–80 |rowspan="2"|Segunda División |27||6||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||27||6 |- |1980–81 |13||1||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||13||1 |- |1981–82 |Segunda División B |32||8||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||32||8 |- |1982–83 |Segunda División |15||2||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||15||2 |- !
